title: If I hear iqamah while praying sunnah prayer at home, should I stop praying? #assim assim al hakeem
transcript: do I want to ask a question if I'm praying my and then I hear theama should I continue with my sunna prayer at home or should I stop the prayer no you have no relationship with of the Masjid this is entirely for the people praying in the Masjid when you're in your home the moment the aan is called it's open for you to pray whenever you want to pray before the during the after the you have nothing to do with the Masjid at all
